name: ESCAPE DRIVE
description:
Escape the law in this vehicular endless runner!

Controls:

  • Gas - Up arrow, "W", ",", up D-Pad, or right trigger/bumper
  • Break - Down arrow, "s", "o", down D-Pad or left trigger/bumper
  • Boost/Start game - SPACE, ENTER, or gamepad face button
  • Steer - "A/D", "A/E", Arrow keys, D-Pad or analogue stick

This is a Ludum Dare 39 submission.

Ludum Dare 39 Page
